forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with a mix of rain and snow this afternoon. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this morning will give way to cloudy skies with a mixture of rain and snow developing during the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low -1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 20-30cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 32F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 8 to 12 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to lingering snow showers during the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 37F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow showers early with a steadier snow developing late at night. Low -7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered snow showers early with a steadier snow developing late at night. Low 21F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High 1C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulation of 30cm or more.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. High 36F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulation of a foot or more.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low -7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low 22F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the morning. High 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the morning. High 37F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low around -5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low near 25F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 2C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 20-30cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. High 37F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 8 to 12 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 27F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. High around 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. High near 35F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy later with any flurries or snow showers ending by midnight. Low -9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low 19F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 20F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High near 45F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.
